channel.title: Newbie That Needs a Mentor ;D
channel.description:
Hello Guys/Gals, to be honest I don't really post much on here, just like to look around. So yeah I need some help... :( :confused: :cool:
I am very new to "Coding" or developing RSPS's :palm:. I'm the type of person that kind of likes to try things first before asking for help. :D Believe me, i have done that, but to no prevail :(, i need someone who has some type of experience that i can ask questions to if i have no clue what i am doing and they can help show me so that i know for the next time. I don't really want someone to code my RSPS for me as much as i want someone to teach me how to code it. I want to code it myself i just don't know how lol :o. I guess you could say i'm looking for a mentor... :P Anyhow if anyone of you are willing to help me with this it would be great and i'm sure quite an experience for the both of us. If you are willing to help please either comment, PM, or Skype me. ;D I would really appreciate it because i have been wanting to learn this for a few years now and it would be really great if i could, so thanks again guys. Hopefully i will be seeing one of you soon ;D :P :D - Skullbandit (P.S. I'm not one of these 16 year old's that are just trying to rip off someone else's work and make a quick profit from it, i actually want to make a really solid server that would be enjoyable for everyone :D)

item.title: Newbie That Needs a Mentor ;D
item.dc:creator: @kbpapango kbpapango
item.description:
@kbpapango wrote:

i already have a vps and another partner for coding the server all i need is a web dev. i can also make website/forums etc., but im busy atm and ill focus on the source. also if u can help me with funds for domain registration ull be co-owner
add my skype: ۩͇̿V͇̿I͇̿P͇̿۩ khen

Read full topic

item.title: Newbie That Needs a Mentor ;D
item.dc:creator: @sertan8 sertan8
item.description:
@sertan8 wrote:

You should download a source, look at the code and just search on google what it means. just like a puzzle. that way you can get the hang of it and later on just take some java lessons on the java website

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Skullbandit Skullbandit
item.description:
@Skullbandit wrote:

Well honestly when someone doesn’t know how to code java, is sounds like it’s rocket science, so yes i would like to start small (just RSPS coding) and eventually once i grasp that, work my way up…

Read full topic
